text: True is the debut studio album by Swedish DJ Avicii and was released on 13 September 2013 through PRMD Music and Columbia Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Denmark, Norway and Sweden. It made the top 10 in Austria, Belgium, Canada, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Portugal, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. == Track listing == # "Wake Me Up" – 4:09 # "You Make Me" – 3:53 # "Hey Brother" – 4:14 # "Addicted to You" – 2:28 # "Dear Boy" – 7:59 # "Liar Liar" – 3:58 # "Shame on Me" – 4:13 # "Lay Me Down" – 5:00 # "Hope There's Someone" – 6:21 # "Heart Upon My Sleeve" – 4:40 == References == Category:2013 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Avicii
title: True (Avicii album)
